A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Truly epic! The story is amazing\, the action is spectacular and the acting is sublime. The direction that Rian Johnson took in making this film is tombe commended\, it's good the first time but it warrants at least two viewings to truly grasp everything that happens and you see the full scope of how brilliant a film it is. On par with Empire as the greatest Star Wars film ever made.
